name: bigamist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who marries a person while already legally married to someone else: He was accused of being a bigamist. The marriage is not valid if one spouse is a bigamist. See
bigamy
More examplesFewer examplesFive years ago, she discovered her husband was a bigamist.He turns out to be an imposter and a bigamist.There are plenty of bigamists who don't mention previous spouses.
